sentences.en: ...a ship with three masts and two funnels.
sentences.cn: …一艘有3根桅杆和2个烟囱的轮船。

sentences.en: A plug of glass wool held in the neck of a polyethylene funnel.
sentences.cn: 玻璃棉塞支承着聚乙烯漏斗的颈部.

sentences.en: A thread of smoke was wisping out of the funnel.
sentences.cn: 一缕清烟从烟囱里袅袅而上.

sentences.en: Along the road, funnels of dark grey smoke rose from bombed villages.
sentences.cn: 沿那条公路，暗灰色烟成漏斗状从遭到轰炸的村庄里升起。

sentences.en: An engine emits smoke from its funnel into the air.
sentences.cn: 机车通过烟囱把烟排入空气里.

sentences.en: Fill a bottle with water through a funnel.
sentences.cn: 通过漏斗把瓶子注满水.

sentences.en: He poured oil into the bottle through a funnel.
sentences.cn: 他用漏斗把油倒进瓶里.

sentences.en: His office funneled millions of dollars in secret contributions to the re-election campaign.
sentences.cn: 他的办公室汇集了数百万美元的秘密捐款用于连任竞选。

sentences.en: I like the ship with a yellow funnel.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢那条有黄烟囱的船.

sentences.en: Large steel funnel with self - closing cover and 33 " brass tube. "
sentences.cn: 大口径的钢制漏斗,带有自闭盖,33 英寸 长的黄铜漏斗管.

sentences.en: Plain areas in the east formed a funnel - shaped zone of groundwater.
sentences.cn: 在东部平原地区形成了地下水漏斗区.

sentences.en: Rain falls through the funnel into the jar below.
sentences.cn: 雨水通过漏斗落进下面的罐子里。

sentences.en: The correctly shaped hill can catch fog, or funnel drip a canyon.
sentences.cn: 丘陵形成合适的地形就能留住浓雾, 或把水滴注入进峡谷.

sentences.en: The funnel - shaped self - potential curve of the Eocene sands is well marked.
sentences.cn: 始新统砂层的 漏斗形 自然电位曲线形态很明显.

sentences.en: The Marsh Funnel ( Viscometer ) is used for routine viscosity determinations.
sentences.cn: 马氏漏斗用作日常泥浆浓度的测定.

sentences.en: The top of the funnel is connected to a tube.
sentences.cn: 这漏斗的顶上接了一根管子.

sentences.en: The train appeared , smoke billowing from the funnel of the engine.
sentences.cn: 火车开来了, 车头的烟囱里冒出滚滚浓烟.

sentences.en: This funnel cloud was spotted over Interstate 95 yesterday.
sentences.cn: 在95号洲际公路发现了漏洞云.

sentences.en: Water as coagulation bath, water law shape in the " funnel spinning. "
sentences.cn: 以水为凝固浴, 水法成形是在 “ 漏斗纺丝 ”.

trans.tran_cn: 漏斗，（轮船，火车等的）烟囱，漏斗状物，[矿]通风井
trans.tran_en: a thin tube with a wide top that you use for pouring liquid into a container with a narrow opening, such as a bottle

trans.tran_cn: 通过漏斗或烟囱等；使成漏斗形
trans.tran_en: to send money, information etc from various places to someone

trans.tran_cn: 把…灌进漏斗，使成漏斗状，成漏斗形，使汇集
